name: places/ChIJk4HQuv9YwokR3F69drCdIWA
formattedAddress: 38 W 46th St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 38 W 46th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text:
Do not recommend. Poor service. You will stand around waiting for your car for at least a half hour. You will also see people that arrive after you get their car before you too.

This garage is notorious for poor service and ridiculous wait times…Look at their reviews, they all say the same thing!
Should be ashamed of themselves.

originalText.text:
Good Morning,

I am reaching out because I have had a poor experience parking at your structure at 38 W. 46th Street. The individuals who I have interacted with are Syed Hussain, the manager, and Pierre Michaud, the valet driver. I turned in my car and our agreement based on the ticket I received was that there was 0 damage to the vehicle. Upon receipt of my car, there were dings and scratches in my car that I had never noticed before. Pierre Michaud and Syed Hussain were reluctant to help and deferred me to putting in a claim, and am now telling me they cannot help because they didn't park the car in a location that could have caused damage. Once again, our contractual agreement indicates that my car had no damage and upon receipt of my car, there were newly found damage not originally indicated.

originalText.text: I parked my car here while staying at a nearby hotel. The overall experience was excellent: check-in was speedy, and I only waited 10 minutes for my car after checking out. There were plenty of employees on both occasions. When I retrieved my car, they prioritized returning cars to clients before handling new ones, which was a stark contrast to other people's experiences.

text.text: I parked my car here while staying at a nearby hotel. The overall experience was excellent: check-in was speedy, and I only waited 10 minutes for my car after checking out. There were plenty of employees on both occasions. When I retrieved my car, they prioritized returning cars to clients before handling new ones, which was a stark contrast to other people's experiences.

originalText.text: The check-in process was stressful - very backed up on a cramped street (not a fun way to kick off vacation).  I’m not sure if they were understaffed (seemed to me that they were) but it took nearly 30 minutes after being 4 cars back waiting to get in…I’d give a star for that experience.  I had to ask twice how the process worked as the main guy handling folks was clearly overwhelmed.  Getting our car back days later was the opposite experience with plenty of staff and everyone being super helpful…validated parking from the Hilton was $50/24-hour period.  Car was retrieved in less than 10 minutes and ready for us (would give 4 stars).  Very different experiences based off demand and staffing it seemed but this SHOULD be a great place to park given its location and elevator system.

originalText.text: Expensive and you will need to wait for a long time to pick up my car. Please do not come here! Waste of time and money!
